column1: All trains must stop for token exchange purposes
All trains must stop for token exchange purposes, unless a Long Section Token has been issued at theprevious Token Exchange Point.
All trains must stop for token exchange purposes
Trains that have originated atGeorgemas Junction C.E/Up Loop
All down trains must stop for token exchange purposes, unless a Long Section Token has been issued atthe previous Token Exchange Point.
All trains must stop for token exchange purposes
Train arriving Up Loop from Wick
All up trains must stop for token exchange purposes, unless a Long Section Token has been issued at theprevious Token Exchange Point.
